issue.title: Save World saves incorrect mesh scale

content.raw:
+1, I can confirm that the scale of meshes is always saved as "1 1 1" regardless of what is stored in the mesh tag of the model. It works fine on gazebo 5, haven't tried gazebo 6, fails on gazebo 7+.

Linking the related issue for cross-reference only https://github.com/mikaelarguedas/gazebo_models/issues/2#issuecomment-289327322
